derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English hagathorn, probably meaning literally 'hedge thorn' (see haw, thorn); related to Dutch haagdoorn, German Hagedorn

entry.def: A hawthorn is a small tree which has sharp thorns and produces white or pink flowers.
